SummaryEnglish: 9-nine is a tale of the town of Shiromitsugawa, host to mysterious Artifacts and the superpowers they bestow on their Users. A tale of growing trust and budding romance between the protagonist and the heroine, and also a murder mystery where they hunt down the culprit behind a series of supernatural murders.
Aliases: ナイン ルーラーズクラウン
ナインしはいしゃのおうかん

1.SummaryEnglish: During a town revitalization event at the White Snake Tsukumo Shrine, a sudden earthquake occurs. Sho Shinkai witnesses the destruction of a sacred artifact in the main hall of the shrine and injures his finger on a fragment he picked up. This was a sign of a quiet and strange occurrence. A few days later, rumors spread that a stone statue of a girl had appeared in the park. In response to this mysterious occurrence, Sho goes to investigate the rumor with his classmates Yoichi Fukazawa and Miyako Kujo to see if it is true. Is it a coincidence or fate? The "story" quietly begins to move.

2.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious fire suddenly breaks out at Hakusen Academy. As the students are filled with fear, Shinkai Sho rushes around trying to save his younger sister, Shinkai Ten. Kujo Miyako, who seems to know something, offers to help Sho. As Sho and Miyako search for the cause of the fire, a supernatural being with the ability to freely control flames appears before them. Facing a threat that cannot be countered by common sense, Miyako activates her powers using an accessory called an "Artifact," which bestows special abilities. As danger looms, the two join forces to face the supernatural being. What fate awaits them at the end of the battle?

3.SummaryEnglish: Miyako has been given the "power to take away ownership of other people's things" by the artifact. Sophitia also tells her that Sho has an unidentified power. With her help, Sho and Miyako begin investigating the culprit of the petrification incident. They discover a new use for Miyako's power and take a step closer to solving the case. The two of them build a strong bond through their investigation. However, Yuki Kia, who is pursuing the culprit of the petrification incident alone, appears and begins to suspect that Sho may be the culprit.

4.SummaryEnglish: After reading Sho's memories, Miyako learns of his feelings for her. The two are no longer able to communicate as naturally as before, and their relationship remains strained, but thanks to Yoichi's arrangement, they have an opportunity to face each other. Overcoming their misunderstandings and confusion, Sho and Miyako begin to move towards a relationship where they can share their true feelings. But just then, along with rumors of a new "petrification incident," Miyako suddenly disappears. Feeling uneasy, Miyako tracks down Miyako using only a few clues, but...

5.SummaryEnglish: Confused by the sensation that he has traveled back in time, Sho is overcome by a strong sense of déjà vu at the shrine. While investigating the source of this strange sensation, Sophie tells him that Sho may possess the power of a certain "special artifact." Meanwhile, Ten pursues the "Queen of Eden" to the shrine, where he encounters Harukaze, Renya, and the mysterious girl "Ghost" gathered. As he tries to get to the truth, he is noticed by one of the group and becomes embroiled in an unexpected event. ©Clearlove・Marvelous・Good Smile Film
